mapper.select: select r.rest_no rest_no, r.code_no code_no, r.rest_name rest_name, r.rest_profile rest_profile, r.rest_tel rest_tel, r.rest_addr rest_addr, r.rest_addr2 rest_addr2, r.rest_naver_score rest_naver_score, r.rest_kakao_score rest_kakao_score, r.rest_google_score rest_google_score, r.rest_score rest_score, r.rest_post_date rest_post_date, c.main_cate main_cate, c.sub_cate sub_cate from restaurant r, category c where r.rest_no = #{rest_no} and r.code_no = c.code_no
mapper.update: MERGE INTO rest_member USING DUAL ON (rest_no = #{rest_no} AND actor_id = #{actor_id}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (rest_no, actor_id, rest_block_yn, rest_block_date) values (#{rest_no}, #{actor_id}, #{rest_block_yn}, sysdate) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET rest_block_yn = #{rest_block_yn}, rest_block_date = sysdate
